channel.title: Adding correct attack emotes to custom weapons [317]
channel.description: how would i go about it, i thought it was server sided but i was wrong. lol :o

item.title: Adding correct attack emotes to custom weapons [317]
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“deathbyu, post:6, topic:333995”]search
if (id == 4153) // maul
{
return 1665;
}

and under it just coppy it and past it in and then change it up to what u want like for example.

	if (id == 4153) // maul
	{
		return 1665;
	}

red=emote id
yellow=item id
and change the maul to what ever item name u have the // wich wont make the words do anything[/quote]

Good job grave digging…

Read full topic

search

{
return 1665;
}

and under it just coppy it and past it in and then change it up to what u want like for example.

	}

red=emote id
yellow=item id
and change the maul to what ever item name u have the // wich wont make the words do anything
